title: [Exile : publicity kit]
brief_description: Publicity kit for the production Exile (1994), including 2 B&W Stills (Large), 28 B&W Stills (Small), 6 35mm Colour Transparencies, 1 Press Kit/ Review, 1 Promo Flyer
